public class Assig41 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String ar=new String("ayyappa");
		System.out.println(ar.concat("swami"));
		System.out.println(ar.charAt(0));
		System.out.println(ar.replace("ayyappa","swami"));
		System.out.println(ar.indexOf('a'));
		System.out.println(ar.startsWith("ayya"));
		System.out.println(ar.endsWith("ppa"));
		System.out.println(ar.equals("swami"));
		System.out.println(ar.substring(0,4));
	}
}
